entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Razor component doesn't render anymore after hot reload first try #36393
  • C# formatter returning invalid edits for some Razor scenarios #36390
  • Startup regression: json #36388
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps #36387
  • Fix upgrade behavior for asp.net runtime in hosting bundle #36382
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Blazor <PageTitle> component conflicts with svg <title> #36380
  • System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException: The client has disconnected An operation was attempted on a nonexistent network connection. #36375
  • SecurityStampValidator reissues the session cookie and extends its expiry #36373
    6.0-rc2
  • Failed to launch debug adapter using .NET 5 Blazor WASM and IIS Express #36372
  • InputDate bug with DateTime? and min - max attributes #36371
  • ASP.NET Core 3.1 Hot Reload taking as long as build time #36376
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main .NET 5, validation-aspnetcore-.NET 5, aspnetcore #aspnetcore-107944-.NET5 #36357

Closed

  • ASP.NET Core SignalR C++ Client 32bit #36276
  • dotnet.js for AOTed apps needs a better cache-busting mechanism #30788
    6.0-rc2
  • Move FromQuery and other meta attributes to a separate lib #36369
  • IdentityUI no longer supports SxS views #30280
    6.0-rc2
  • Add user-secrets "get" command to CLI #27045
    Next sprint planning
  • dotnet-sdk-5.0.100-rc.1.20452.10 HTTPS Certificate Not Recognized, Removed and Added #28322
    Next sprint planning
  • ssh dotnet certificate #31415
    Next sprint planning
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.StackExchangeRedis disposing connections while in use #36092
  • blazor multiple authentication cookie schemes not working #35832
  • ASP.NET Core SignalR messages are stalled for hours and lost #36020
  • Razor Pages Folder doesn't seen to see changes. #36038
  • Blazor WASM AuthorizationMessageHandler caches AccessToken even after user has changed #35888
    6.0-rc2
  • Issue: Consume multiple BlazorCustomElements in js-frameworks (React, Vue, etc) #36329
  • UseAngularCliServer blocked by node processes it's leaving open from prior execution #36250
  • Blazor WebAssembly .Net Core Hosted - Delete temp file after its downloaded to the browser #36282
  • Part2 - Improve error messages for implicit and explicit FromBody attribute in Minimal API #35405
    6.0-rc2
  • Create an analyzer to detect mismatched parameter optionality #34553
    6.0-rc2
  • Redundant FormatScope() override in FacebookHandler #36370
  • AuthenticationMiddleware should probably try all Schemes not just the default one. #36278
    Discussions
  • Cannot set Response.StatusText #36359
  • Resolve issues with dotnet-openapi tests in latest SDK #32686
    7.0-preview1
  • 5.0 docs: Kestrel config reload #26241
    6.0-rc2
  • Blazor Hosted - Pass model to Server with NavigationManager #35530
    6.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Implement 100 Continue for HTTP/3 #36395
    area-runtime
  • Honor sliding expiration in the security stamp validator #36394
    area-identity, 7.0-preview1
  • DO NOT MERGE: Validating Helix docker fixups #36384
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix up solution file #36383
    area-infrastructure
  • Improve error messages for missing body and services (#36064) #36381
    area-runtime
  • Cherry-pick mismatched parameter optionality analyzer and clean up directories #36379
  • Use one-shot static hash methods #36368
    area-security, community-contribution
  • [SignalR TS] Fix typo in Errors.ts #36367
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • [release/5.0] Handle shortened JSON file in dotnet openapi #36363
    Servicing-consider, area-commandlinetools, feature-openapi
  • [release/3.1] Handle shortened JSON file in `dotnet openapi` #36362
    Servicing-consider, area-commandlinetools, feature-openapi

Merged

  • [release/6.0] Capture `dotnet` dumps #36392
    area-infrastructure, 6.0-rc2
  • [SPA] Update SPA submodule #36389
    7.0-preview1
  • Capture `dotnet` dumps #36385
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Initial Bootstrap v4 SxS support #36378
    area-identity, 6.0-rc2
  • Set initial capacity for headers HashSet #36365
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • Invalidate Cached WASM Auth Token on Authentication State Change #36358
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • Remove WebView path/query code that isn't used anymore (#36354) (port from 6.0 branch) #36377
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • Improve error messages for missing body and services #36064
    area-runtime, api-approved, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview1
  • Remove WebView path/query code that isn't used anymore #36354
    area-blazor, 6.0-rc2
  • Add analyzer for detecting mismatched endpoint parameter optionality #36154
    area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc2
  • Fix polycheck issues #36374
    area-runtime
  • [release/3.1] Remove blob feeds #36344
  • Remove `dotnet-core` feed #36346
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [release/5.0] Fix component governance bugs #36350
    tell-mode, 5.0.11
  • [release/6.0] Handle shortened JSON file in `dotnet openapi` #36355
    area-commandlinetools, feature-openapi, 6.0-rc2
  • [release/6.0] Fix component governance bugs #36351
    6.0-rc2
  • [release/6.0] Add Win11 helix-matrix/quarantine queue, remove win7/8 #36349
    area-infrastructure, 6.0-rc2
  • [release/6.0] Fixed duplicate metadata in ModelDataSource #36340
    area-runtime, 6.0-rc2
  • Handle shortened JSON file in `dotnet openapi` #36171
    area-commandlinetools, feature-openapi, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Implement 100 Continue for HTTP/3 #36168
    area-runtime
  • dotnet-dev-certs: prototype Linux trust support #33279
    area-commandlinetools, feature-devcerts, community-contribution
  • Initial Bootstrap v4 SxS support #35981
    area-identity
  • Blazor Request Localization Updates Culture for All Threads #36259
    area-runtime
  • Check for duplicate endpoint names on startup #36353
    area-runtime
  • Use minimal APIs for F# project templates #35833
    area-mvc
  • Warn that UseStartup/Configure/ConfigureWebHost not supported on WebApplicationBuilder #35884
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
